Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ OMG! The economy is going through some trend-making changes, people! The Australian dollar is taking HUGE hits, whilst interest rate hikes are causing havoc with home buyers and investors alike. With several consecutive hiked interest rates, the Reserve Bank of Australia is feeling the heat from economists, who predict only one more rise this year. Plus, economists say that whilst there are positive jobs figures in the market, a possible rate hike from RBA is looming. Will Jim Chalmers step in and be proactive on productivity? Watch this space, people!
